name: Mahjong — Puzzle Games
description:
Because of its simple rules and engaging game play, mahjong solitaire free has become one of the most popular puzzle board games in the world. Mahjong games is also known as Taipei, Solitaire Mahjong, Mahjong Shanghai, Majong, Mahjong Classic and Mahjongg Solitaire.

You need to match open pairs of identical tiles and remove them from the board, exposing the tiles under them for play. The game is finished when all pairs of tiles have been removed from the board.

Mahjong involves skill, strategy, and calculation, as well as a certain degree of luck.
